title: CDC changes school guidance, allowing desks to be closer NEW YORK
content:
1. CDC changes school guidance, allowing desks to be closer NEW YORK  Associated Press
  2. Updated CDC guidance says 3 feet of physical distancing is safe in schools  CNN
  3. C.D.C. Says 3 Feet Between Elementary School Students Is OK  The New York Times
  4. CDC to change school social distancing guidelines as metro Detroit schools deal with outbreaks  WXYZ-TV Detroit | Channel 7
  5. CDC shortens Covid social distancing guidelines for kids in school to 3 feet with masks  CNBC
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
